segments.text: I keep looking at the woman at the sink, and I just don't understand it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the cold water swirling around her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's simply baffling to me how deeply engrossed she is in that one plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a flood happening at her feet, for goodness sake!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer lack of awareness is almost comical, if it weren't so concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got a perfectly neutral expression, completely serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her priorities seem incredibly misplaced in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All those dishes are stacked neatly on the counter to her right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost makes me want to shout to get her attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before this gets even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't even glanced away from that plate once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess she's inadvertently creating right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's honestly quite vexing to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
